001package com.example.geometry;
002
003/**
004 * A geometric shape with an area and perimeter.
005 *
006 * <p>This interface showcases a simple, reusable API that multiple
007 * implementations can satisfy.</p>
008 *
009 * @author ChatGPT
010 * @since 1.0
011 */
012public interface Shape {
013    /**
014     * Computes the area of this shape.
015     *
016     * @return the area (non-negative)
017     */
018    double area();
019
020    /**
021     * Computes the perimeter (a.k.a. circumference) of this shape.
022     *
023     * @return the perimeter (non-negative)
024     */
025    double perimeter();
026
027    /**
028     * Provides a short human-readable description.
029     *
030     * @return a short description (never {@code null})
031     */
032    String describe();
033}
